loc1.name: Acropolis Museum
loc1.description: Ultramodern glass & steel museum housing ancient artifacts from the Acropolis archaeological site.

loc2.name: National Museum of Contemporary Art Αthens (ΕΜΣΤ)
loc2.description: Noted collection of Greek & international contemporary art housed in a sleek-design former brewery.

loc3.name: Acropolis of Athens
loc3.description: Ruins of iconic 5th-century B.C. temple complex on Athens' rocky hilltop undergoing restoration.

loc4.name: National Gallery - Alexandros Soutsos Museum
loc4.description: Greek & European paintings, statues, engravings & installations from the 1400s to the present day.

loc6.name: National Archaeological Museum
loc6.description: Neoclassical museum of Ancient Greek art & archaeology, with sculpture, metalwork, vases & jewelry.

loc7.name: Temple of Poseidon
loc7.description: 5th-century BCE temple ruins with Doric-style columns, offering sweeping views of the sea.

loc8.name: Temple of Olympian Zeus
loc8.description: Vast temple begun in 6th century B.C. on the site of an ancient outdoor sanctuary dedicated to Zeus.

loc9.name: Panathenaic Stadium
loc9.description: Site of the first modern Olympic games in 1896, now hosting ceremonial events & tours.

loc10.name: Museum of Cycladic Art
loc10.description: Museum featuring ancient Cycladic sculptures & artifacts, with kid-friendly activities & exhibits.

loc12.name: National Historical Museum - Old Parliament House
loc12.description: Exhibits on modern Greek history spanning art, weapons & documents, in the Old Parliament building.

loc14.name: Ohh Boy
loc14.description: Coffee, desserts & brunch served in a compact, country-chic cafe with a terrace.

loc24.name: Athens National Garden
loc24.description: Big historic park with native & exotic plants, plus archeological remains & a children's library.

loc29.name: ERGON House Athens
loc29.description: Sophisticated hotel above a trendy marketplace & food court, plus free breakfast & Wi-Fi.

loc33.name: Rooster
loc33.description: Buzzy all-day gay hangout for pasta, pizza & comfort food, plus art & photography exhibitions.

loc36.name: Drachmi
loc36.description: Cocktails & coffee are served at this cozy, convivial hangout with outdoor tables.

loc40.name: Bios
loc40.description: Acropolis views from the rooftop bar of an arts center that hosts movies, concerts & DJ sessions.

loc42.name: Athens Concert Hall
loc42.description: Large complex with 4 concert halls offering a lineup of musical, dance & theatrical performances.

loc43.name: Vallianeio Megaron
loc43.description: Grand neoclassical building from 1832 housing  Greek-related books, periodicals & manuscripts.

loc46.name: Philopappos Hill
loc46.description: Views of Athens & the Acropolis attract hikers to this small peak with an ancient monument.

loc47.name: Mount Lycabettus
loc47.description: This prominent limestone peak features a cable car, open-air concert venue & panoramic views.

loc48.name: Stavros Niarchos Foundation Cultural Center
loc48.description: Modern cultural hub with a national library, opera house, theater & surrounding park.

loc49.name: Varvakios Central Municipal Market
loc49.description: Fish, meat & produce are sold at this central market, also featuring restaurants.

loc50.name: Technopolis City of Athens
loc50.description: Set in a former gasworks, this arts & culture space now hosts concerts, exhibitions & a gas museum.
